CcoBattleAbility.doc: Component context wrapper for a battle ability (EMPIREBATTLE::ABILITY_DETAILS) which has live information for an ability like cooldown time, etc. exposes all information available to UiEd
CcoBattleAbility.name: CcoBattleAbility

symbols.doc: Returns the percent (0-1) the ability is through its active duration (progression until ability finishes), 0 if ability is not currently active

symbols.doc: Returns list of CcoPair<CcoStringValue, CcoSpecialAbilityPhaseRecord>; the active phases for each target essentially

symbols.name: CurrentState

symbols.doc: Returns the range in metres that this ability will affect from the cast point

symbols.doc: This is used for circular fills on 3k, where when ability active we unfill the ring (anti-clockwise), then when in cooldown we fill the ring (clockwise), and show the ring full while ability available (so transitions between cooldown being over and ring staying there)
symbols.name: FillPercent

symbols.doc: Returns true if the ability has a limited number of uses (queried by RemainingUses)
symbols.name: HasLimitedUses

symbols.doc: Returns the intensity that modifiable stats of this ability will be multiplied by
symbols.name: Intensity

symbols.name: IsActive

symbols.doc: Returns true if this ability is currently being targetted by the player
symbols.name: IsCurrentlyTargetting

symbols.doc: Returns true if supplied CcoSpecialAbilityPhaseRecord is active in any of abilities phase trees

symbols.doc: Returns true if all recharge contexts for this ability are true (eg engaged in melee)

symbols.doc: Returns true if this is an amry ability that can be rewarded as a reign of chaos outcome
symbols.name: IsReignOfChaosReward

symbols.doc: Returns true if this is an ability that you have to select a target for
symbols.name: IsTargettedAbility

symbols.doc: Returns some localised text that explains what left clicking on a button for this ability would currently do (activate, toggle targetting, toggle overcharge, etc)
symbols.name: LeftClickText

symbols.doc: Returns how much mana is used when activating this ability
symbols.name: ManaUsed

symbols.doc: Returns 0-1 value representing how likely to miscast when activate. A miscast will have negative impacts on the caster and the ability will fail to activate.
symbols.name: MiscastChance

symbols.doc: Activates the ability for the owner (unit/army)

symbols.doc: Returns the cooldown percentage if in cooldown (0-1), 0 if not in cooldown
symbols.name: RechargePercent

symbols.doc: Returns the cooldown time remaining seconds if ability is in cooldown
symbols.name: RechargeTimeRemainingSecs

symbols.doc: Returns the number of remaining uses, -1 if unlimited
symbols.name: RemainingUses

symbols.doc: Returns the CcoUnitAbility setup for this ability (fixed information that doesnt change during the battle)

symbols.doc: Returns the wind up percentage (0-1), 0 being not in windup and 1 being at the point where casts the spell. Wind up is the casting time essentially.
symbols.name: WindUpPercent

symbols.doc: Returns the wind up time remaining in seconds. Wind up is the casting time essentially.

CcoCampaignPendingAction.doc: Cco wrapper for getting information on the current pending action in campaign. CcoScriptObject.doc: Script adds these via script function effect.set_context_value.Then allows us to leverage context framework so for example could show fill bar for faction awesomeness without requiring any C++ code.Also these can be used in layouts for a global value registry system where can get/set arbitrary global values using ContextInitScriptObject in conjunction with other callbacks like ContextVisibilitySetter and ContextCommandLeftClick for example

symbols.doc: Returns the first index of the specified string, searching from the front. Returns -1 if none found. Can specify a starting position to search from as second parameter, this defaults to 0 if none specified

symbols.doc: Returns true if this string is empty/blank
symbols.name: IsEmpty

symbols.doc: Returns the length of this string
